scripts.prepublish: npm run build:babel && npm run build:module
scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.build:babel: mkdirp dist && browserify node_modules/babel/index.js -s babel -o dist/babel.js
scripts.build:module: mkdirp dist && browserify src/module.js -t babelify -s es6module -o dist/es6-module-standalone.js
